attributes.action: That all local Authorities provide and service sufficient Public Toilets.
attributes.additional_details: Tourists to this country have the right to Public Toilets as we all do.
attributes.background:
it is becoming common practice that Authorities are as a result of the Government cut backs are trying to save money by closing Public Toilets.
There is no consideration what so ever for the people of this country. Particularly as there is an increase in elderly people.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition calling on the Government to set minimum standards for the provision of public toilets, which all local councils would have to meet.
